name: I'll Kill The Last Alien
description:
Made for Wizard Jam 5. 

 I'll Kill The Last Alien transports the player into the role of The Berserker, a raging warrior who is flung out of a portal and into a fantasy alien world. The game uses bullet hell conventions to make meaningful fighting between The Berserker and the near endless waves of aliens.

Jess and Spencer were so happy to be able to team up with the artist Steven Sugar to work on this game. Halfway through the jam, composer Ben Taber, a.k.a. Problem Machine, was brought on to the team to fill out the game's soundtrack.

You can here more from Ben at https://problemmachine.bandcam...

You can follow Steven at http://stevensugar.tumblr.com/

Controls:

Left Stick / Arrow Keys - Move

A Button / Right Bumper / Space Bar / C key - Roll

X Button / Left Trigger / X key - Time Magic (when unlocked)
